description: V3001: There are identical sub-expressions 'i != 0' to the left and to the right of the '&&' operator.
V3004: The 'then' statement is equivalent to the 'else' statement.
V3137: The 'result' variable is assigned but is not used by the end of the function.

V3137: The 'b' variable is assigned but is not used by the end of the function.
V3137: The 'c' variable is assigned but is not used by the end of the function.
V3053: An excessive expression. Examine the substrings 'abc' and 'abcd'.
V3158: The '5 % 5' expression always evaluates to 0. Absolute values of both operands are equal.
V3137: The 'str' variable is assigned but is not used by the end of the function.
V3176: The '&=' operator is redundant because the right operand 'status' is always true.
V3137: The 'currentStatus' variable is assigned but is not used by the end of the function.
V3003: The use of 'if (A) {...} else if (A) {...}' pattern was detected. There is a probability of logical error presence. Check lines: 65, 69.
V3002: The switch statement does not cover all values of the 'Actions' enum: Reset.
V3083: Unsafe invocation of event 'MyEvent', NullReferenceException is possible. Consider assigning event to a local variable before invoking it.
